author: potuz
content: Please take a look at the section I added at the beginning with the problem description: what I would really like is to have you gauge how big of a lift would it be to either add the payload bit to the attestation, or what I think it's a cleaner solution: allow attestations to be for the payload hash. This will change attestation counting, we would keep the participation flags untouched, just that timely head now will be obtained by voting for the right CL head or the payload included in that right CL head. The advantage of this change is that it does not touch forkchoice at all (besides of course the unavoidable having to deal with the trees of full and empty nodes)

author: potuz
content: I am starting to warm up to the idea that this is not such a big change, but haven't thought about it deeply
